name: part_007
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Shirakami Fubuki perform 'Seiza ni Naretara'. The stage features a starry sky backdrop and castle-like structures.
Transition scene with applause as Houshou Marine joins Murasaki Shion on stage.
Murasaki Shion and Houshou Marine perform 'Tenshi ni Fureta yo!'.

subtitles.original: ルル…エテール…シグナル…
subtitles.english: Lu lu... Ether... Signal...

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 空見上げて指を指されるような
subtitles.english: Looking up at the sky, like we're being pointed at

subtitles.original: つないだ線ほどかないで
subtitles.english: Don't undo the lines we've connected

subtitles.original: 僕がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright I am

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は8時
subtitles.english: The clock will soon strike 8:00

subtitles.original: 夜空に満天の星
subtitles.english: The night sky is full of stars

subtitles.original: 何億光年離れたところには
subtitles.english: In a place hundreds of millions of light-years away

subtitles.original: もうないかもしれない
subtitles.english: They might not even exist anymore

subtitles.original: 月が綺麗で泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: The moon is so beautiful it makes me want to cry

subtitles.original: いつかの日にか
subtitles.english: Because I know that one day

subtitles.original: 別れが来るから
subtitles.english: A farewell will surely come

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 彗星みたいな流れる独り言
subtitles.english: My flowing monologues are like comets

subtitles.original: 消えていく残像は
subtitles.english: The fading afterimages

subtitles.original: 真夜中のプリズム
subtitles.english: Are prisms in the middle of the night

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 切な願い誰かに届いたら
subtitles.english: If my painful wish could reach someone

subtitles.original: 変われるかな夜の縁を
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can change,

subtitles.original: なぞるようなこんな僕でも
subtitles.english: Even for someone like me who traces the edge of the night

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方僕らは出会ってしまった
subtitles.english: In the far distance, we ended up meeting

subtitles.original: カルマだから何度も出会ってしまうよ
subtitles.english: Because it's karma, we'll keep meeting again and again

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間で
subtitles.english: Through the gaps in the clouds

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 夜広げて描こう絵空事
subtitles.english: Let's spread out the night and paint an empty dream

subtitles.original: 暗闇を照らすような
subtitles.english: Something that lights up the darkness,

subtitles.original: 満月じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's not a full moon

subtitles.original: だから集まって星座になりたい
subtitles.english: That's why I want to gather and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 色とりどりの光放つような
subtitles.english: Shining with many different colors

subtitles.original: つないだ線ほどかないよ
subtitles.english: I won't undo the lines we've connected

subtitles.original: 君がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright you are

subtitles.original:
天使にふれたよ！
作詞：稲葉エミ　作曲：川口進
subtitles.english:
Tenshi ni Fureta yo!
Lyrics: Emi Inaba, Composition: Susumu Kawaguchi

subtitles.original: ねえ、思い出のカケラに
subtitles.english: Hey, let's name these fragments of memories

subtitles.original: 名前をつけて保存
subtitles.english: And save them

subtitles.original: するなら「宝物」が
subtitles.english: I think 'Treasures'

subtitles.original: ぴったりだね
subtitles.english: Is the perfect name

subtitles.original: そう、心の容量が
subtitles.english: Yes, we've spent so much time together

subtitles.original: いっぱいになるくらいに
subtitles.english: That our heart's storage

subtitles.original: 過ごしたね
subtitles.english: Is almost full

subtitles.original: ときめき色の毎日
subtitles.english: Every day filled with excitement

subtitles.original: 馴染んだ制服と上履き
subtitles.english: Our familiar uniforms and school shoes,

subtitles.original: ホワイトボードの落書き
subtitles.english: And the doodles on the whiteboard

subtitles.original: 明日の入り口に
subtitles.english: I wonder if I really have to leave them

subtitles.original: 置いてこなくちゃいけないのかな
subtitles.english: At the entrance to tomorrow

subtitles.original: でもね、会えたよ！
subtitles.english: But you know, I met one!

subtitles.original: すてきな天使に
subtitles.english: A wonderful angel

subtitles.original: 卒業は終わりじゃない
subtitles.english: Graduation is not the end

subtitles.original: これからも仲間だから
subtitles.english: We'll be friends from now on, too

subtitles.original: 一緒の写真たち
subtitles.english: The photos we took together

subtitles.original: おそろのキーホルダー
subtitles.english: And our matching keychains

subtitles.original: いつまでも輝いてる
subtitles.english: Will shine forever

subtitles.original: ずっと その笑顔 ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for that smile, always

subtitles.original: もう 桜の花びらも
subtitles.english: Even the cherry blossom petals

subtitles.original: ぜんぶ 散ってしまったね
subtitles.english: Have all fallen by now
